channel.title: [Hyperion] Pallas
channel.description:
[center]
Hello I am looking for a team or partner to help me develop off my current Hyperion server. There will be media posted below for people who want proof of development. I'm not going to spend hours creating a visually appealing thread when a basic one does the same thing and doesn't take time I could use to be programming the server. This is the original Hyperion with several new packets loaded and much more content than is currently covered in the media. Right now the name is Pallas but i'm open to changes because names never seemed to matter very much to me. To apply please fill out an application below the media.
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2248945/Pallas1.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2248949/Pallas2.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2248950/Pallas3.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2248954/Pallas4.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2248961/Pallas5.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2248967/Pallas6.png[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2248968/Pallas7.png[/img]
[left]
[code]
Age:
Name:
Location:
Years Programming:
Time Online Per Day:
A Little Bit About You:
Previous Work:
Skype/Msn:
[/code]
[/left]
[/center]

item.title: [Hyperion] Pallas
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Well since I love Hyperion so much.

Age: 17

Name: Rodrigo Molina

Location: Lake Worth, Florida, United States

Years Programming: 2

Time Online Per Day: around 5

A Little Bit About You: My name is Rodrigo Molina, and I am an senior at **** **** Community High School. I am currently a senior at the high school, and am graduating with a 2.3 GPA (it’s low because I messed up freshman year) on May 13th. I love programming and learning more about the computer. I am going to a state college for two years to raise my GPA, then going to an university to major in Computer Science or Business Administration. I am now thinking of writing RPG’s or MMORPG games in the future after I gradutate. I am a very awesome and exciting guy (from what I’ve been told), but I do have some buttons you do NOT to push just like everybody else. Honestly, I will get lazy of this development IF I am not piled with assignments and tasks to do or if I have to wait for you or anybody else to do something in order for me to continue.

Previous Work: Worked on many developments, including Apollo which I am currently in Protoscape, just need something else to do on my free time. I released an Hyperion a while back with some of my work, I can provide you with the link, on which I wrote some of the combat and fixed some huge bugs, also wrote NPCvNPC combat.

Skype/Msn: msn: lazerbike@hotmail.com; i dont go on skype much…

Read full topic

item.title: [Hyperion] Pallas
item.dc:creator: @iz3_legend iz3 legend
item.description:
@iz3_legend wrote:

k1ng0frs:

Good Luck, Is working with Hyperion Fun?

Yeah it’s decent i guess, haven’t really gotten to any fun content yet. Just doing the basics.

Ix Soulcist xI:

This seems rather nice so far, looking forward for this.

Thank you.
